item.title: Adding a code in client.java help
item.dc:creator: @ytpingas ytpingas
item.description:
@ytpingas wrote:

OK, im to add this code into client.java

[code]if (logcount == 0)
{
logcount += 1;
showInterface(3559);
ResetBonus();
GetBonus();
WriteBonus();
Poisoned = false;
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName+" has just logged in.";
playerLastConnect = connectedFrom;

	}
	else if (logcount >=1 )
	{
		logcount += 1;
		MainHelpMenu();
		ResetBonus();
		GetBonus();
		WriteBonus();
		Poisoned = false;
		PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName+" has just logged in.";
		savemoreinfo();
	}[/code]

Where exactly Where would i place it under or over.

I got teamviewer

Read full topic
